name: The nightmare of Sainte-Catherine
description:
Explore a nightmarish maze  full of abominations and eldritch horrors. Collect all items in a creppy point-and-click to solve the mysteries of the Sainte-Catherine Community center. 

notes: 

  •      we recommand to play the game in full screen.
  •      you only need your mouse.
  • set the screen very dark for a spookier vibe. 

credits: 

  • code

Xavier Morin, Luan Meiyi

  • graphics

Louis A. Duval

  • sound design and voice acting

Victor Bélanger, Cloée Morissette

  • singing

Cloée Morissette

all the visual assets have been made for the game during the Jam.

We give a big thanks to the Centre Communautaire de Loisirs Sainte-Catherine d'Alexandrie for the setting and the story.
